Diagnostics.useRequestTable ( $  index  ) 

Sets the core to point to the a care_test_request_????? table. The ????? is replaced with string passed as parameter. public

Parameters:
string The string to append to "care_test_request_" to create a complete table name.

Diagnostics.setWhereCond ( $  cond  ) 

Sets the "where" variable of the core class. The passed condition will be used in the WHERE part of the sql query. public

Parameters:
string The string to append to "care_test_request_" to create a complete table name.
